title: Incorrect 'Build' Popup Action Enablement
description: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even if the user goes to Preferences > Workbench and selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification.' The 'Build' menu option still appears in the Java popup menus. I believe this is incorrect.
OB: The 'Build' action in the context-sensitive popup menu in the Java perspective is always enabled, even when the user has configured automatic builds in Preferences > Workbench. It should be disabled when automatic builds are enabled.
EB: The 'Build' action in the Java perspective's context-sensitive popup menu should be disabled when the user selects 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' in Preferences > Workbench.
SR:
1. Open the Java perspective in the software.
2. Go to Preferences > Workbench.
3. Select the 'Perform build automatically on resource modification' option.
4. Right-click on a Java project or file in the Java perspective.
5. Observe that the 'Build' action is still enabled in the context-sensitive popup menu, even though it should be disabled.
